lender.occupational_info: Love being Grandparents.

lender.name: Meezan
lender.occupational_info: I was teaching at a new institution in a post-conflict zone (with all the associated problems). The reward was students who revel in the freedom to say what they really think. Located in the Kurdish region of Iraq. Inspired by those students, I am currently doing an MEd regarding pedagogy, fiction and trauma.

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because: My father built his small business on loans from friends and family. Thanks to those loans and my father's hard work I was able to attend and graduate from college. I want to help people build their business so their family can also have a better future.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a hotel in Napa Valley, California - a place that is best known for its wine and food. My job is in Guest Reception, which means I help guests in almost every process of their stay at our hotel: making reservations, checking in, finding places to eat, checking out, and anything else they might need. I love helping others, talking, and meeting new people - so this job is perfect for me.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship, opening up opportunities, and that microfinance can be more effective than simple charities and foundations.

lender.name: Dimitar
lender.loan_because:
Здравейте, името ми е Димитър Чакъров. Последните няколко месеца бяха време на напомняне на призива от Бог и служението ми в гр. Стралджа. Аз вярвам, че Бог е този Който възстановява позиции и Той кара хората да осъзнаят, че извън Божията воля няма успех за тях. За тези няколко месеца ние виждаме промяната и работата на Святия Дух. Работата, която ми предстои тук е наистина много. Имам много срещи с хора от църквата, които се нуждаят от покаяние и обръщане отново към Бог. Също редовно посещавам моите братя и сестри по домовете им, за да се моля с тях. Имам отговорност и към региона около Стралджа. Благодарен съм, че Бог ми дава благодат за всички ми дейности тук! Вярвам, че църквата ни ще се разшири и ще стане място, от където ще излизат благословени и помазани служители на Бог! Знам, че Царят има велик план за този град и съм готов да го изпълним! Но за осъществяването му се нуждаем от верни сътрудници, които да ме подкрепят духовно и материално! Така че ако вие или ваши приятели не сте се включили в това дело, но желаете, можете да го направите!
На 05.09.09 стартирахме младежкото служение под надслов „Новото начало”. Имахме добро и благословено време с много скъпи хора. Помазаното хваление на приятели от Ямбол отвори младите сърца и желанието им за „новото начало”. Приятели от София ни послужиха с насърчителни слова за „новото начало” и това беше кулминацията на Божието присъствие, довела младежите пред Бог в молитва за покаяние и обръщение.
Предстои ни откриване на нова учебна година на библейски курс в църквата към ORA – International, България. Това е радост и благословение за нас.
Ще започне скоро и детското служение към църквата с нов ентусиазъмработа сред децата. В процес на сформиране е и молитвен тим, който подкрепя всички видове служения на църквата.
Не на пследно място е ни за предстоящия голям ремонт на църквата с цел подръжка на сградата:покрив; изолация; вътрешен дизайн и уют. Видението ни за дейността на църквата не се ограничава до тук, но ще го споделяме с вас по малко в следващите наши бюлетини.
lender.occupational_info: През 2002 г. завърших бакалавърската си степен по богословие, а през 2007 г. се дипломирах и като магистър. През 2003 година със специално слово и призив от Бога започнах служение в ЕПЦ‐ гр. Стралджа с пастор Ангел Петков като помощник пастор и младежки ръководител. Този период от една година и половина в упоменатата църква Бог ме е употребяваше свръхестествено и съживителното действие на ха даде плодове, църквата се умножи, благовестието се утвърди, църковното общество е преобладавало предимно с млада аудитория. През този период беше сформиран випуск на библейски курс към ОRA‐Интернешънъл в църквата. Освен в локалната църква съвместната ни работа с п-р Петков даде своите плодове и отражение и в самият район като показахме обгрижване, много активност в подобряване на реда и църковната дисциплина. Есента на 2004 година стартирах магистратурата си по богословие в Шуменският университет „Епископ Константин Преславски”. В средата на 2005 година трябваше да взема решение да напусна служението си, поради липса на финанси и поради невъзможноста ми да покривам нуждите си относно обучението ми. Напускайки служението си с ясната представа, че не съм завършил цялостно видението за тази църква аз вярвах, че ще дойде времето в което да бъда върнат. От напускането на църквата до този момент работих в гр. София за да завърша образованието.

lender.name: Caroline Alexa McBride
lender.loan_because: My parents and my country blessed me with many opportunities to succeed while my religion inspires me to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Director of Business Development for Serafina Restaurant Group, a private company consisting of 11 popular restaurants (Italian, French, Japanese and Mexican) in New York City, East Hampton, Philadelphia and Brazil. The founders, Vittorio Assaf and Fabio Granato, are Italian immigrants who now employ over 750 people to produce high quality cuisine and provide excellent service at their fashionable locations. Vittorio and Fabio treat their employees like family and they epitomize the “American Dream” as their culinary empire grows. My job is to facilitate key aspects of domestic and international expansion and franchising, handle public relations, market locations virally and using traditional methods, promote our specialty products, secure corporate accounts and manage all of our charity activities. I work with a diverse, energetic staff and eat amazing food everyday—my job is a blessing.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Microfinance helps smooth income for entrepreneurs in low-income countries, ultimately allowing them to send their children to school, buy necessary food, and pay health expenses.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Giving other people loans is not only self gratifying, but it funds other people’s livelihood. Kiva acts as a savings account for me, allowing me give help to those in need with money that I wouldn’t be using anyways.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I am a student at a Jesuit College Prep, a private school in North Dallas.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: I love the concept that a small loan can change a life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the legal field that is challenging, rewarding and well paid and I am grateful.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I feel I have been blessed and want to share blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I design and install beautiful gardens.

lender.name: Ed N
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I look for new technologies that can help my company.

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: A lot of people around the world don't have the same opportunities that I have to borrow money from a large bank. It is the very least to offer my support to hardworking honest entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student and a part time debt collector.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: The disparity in wealth between nations is an ongoing cause of much of the world's problems. This is my small effort to move things, however slightly, in the right direction.
lender.occupational_info: I help people use computers to improve their working and personal lives.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: This is the real free-trade, a direct connection between the haves and the have-nots. NAFTA, the WTO, the World Bank, the IMF, and all their ilk are simply new ways for the rich to grow richer. I'd rather help the poor grow richer.

lender.name: Kimberley Hoggan
lender.loan_because: I want to remind myself that one must not take things for granted. We are here on this earth to try and succeed in helping others not just serve ourselves.A small token can sometimes go a long way, if we can just give a bit of ourselves.

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to help
lender.occupational_info: I renovate houses and absolutely love what I do.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about restoring the image of God in humankind so people can live out their full redemptive potential
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are the Corps Officers (Senior Pastors) of a Salvation Army church in the southern suburbs of Adelaide, South Australia.

lender.occupational_info: I love my work!

lender.occupational_info: Work with computers.

lender.occupational_info: I sew custom clothing (corsets).

The best way to put your wealth to good use is to use it to propel the talents of those around you, as well as yourself. Why keep it under lock and key when someone could put it to better use?
lender.occupational_info: I study... a lot.

lender.occupational_info: I'm a student studying at university to become a lawyer.

lender.occupational_info: I get to interact with people all over the world.

lender.loan_because: we care.
lender.occupational_info: We read books and talk about world issues.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I want to see women empowered in their businesses and provision for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor of a church in South London.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I have travelled extensively throughout my life, and have always been impressed how people make the best of what is available to them, even if that is very little. I am happy to be in a position to make more available to these people.
lender.occupational_info: I design subsea mechanical equipment used to monitor the forces on offshore oil rigs and their responses to these forces.

lender.name: Matija
lender.loan_because: This amount of money could mean a lot more to someone else, than to myself. I hope it may empower people to help themselves and the others, making at least a tiny place of a world a better place to live in.
lender.occupational_info: I earn a living by making computers do tasks they were meant to do. They often misbehave, and I have to correct their act so they would not repeat those mistakes in the future. Think of it as a teacher for computers.

lender.name: Marsha
lender.loan_because: I am the proud mother of a Kiva Fellow.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: The oatmeal fears nothing, not even tornadoes or scurvy

lender.name: lee
lender.loan_because: I want to help out disadvantaged people.
lender.occupational_info: I build and run dozens of websites at any one time.

lender.name: Stan
lender.loan_because: "If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth." 1 John 3:17-18
lender.occupational_info: To laugh often and much; to win the respect of intelligent people and the affection of children...to leave the world a better place...to know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded. ~ Ralph Waldo Emerson

lender.name: Ernst family
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to have been born in a country were even the unfortuanate are rather fortunate. And this has afforded me the opportunity to help

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: God has greatly blessed me. We are commanded in multiple scriptures in the Bible to give back to those that are less fortunate. Kiva is unique amongst organizations in it's ability to provide for those that are less fortunate by helping them help themselves.

lender.name: Julien
lender.occupational_info:
I work for the U.S. Government on climate change models.
Je travaille pour le gouvernement des E.U. d'Amérique sur les modèles de changements climatiques

lender.name: Dave M
lender.loan_because: heard about it from Stuff You Should Know

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I want to see change in the everyday lives of my neighbour. Mother Teresa said that we can do no great things. Only small things with great love. I guess that although I know the I'm only giving a little tiny bit, it will be a a little bit that will help one person, and that's all that matters.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student, meaning that I study and study until my head hurts. I am also the co-facilitator of Mount Allison's Free the Children Youth in Action Group, International Relations Society, and Cinema Politica. I eventually want to dedicate my life to helping others by meeting whatever needs they have, whether this be with the United Nations or with a local charity group.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: the people I help are helping themselves and their families to a better life

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Josh and Chuck told me to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a process engineer designing plants and refineries.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Maybe I can actually be part of making a difference to people who do not have the option of lending money to fund a good project via a bank :-)

lender.name: Sonya
lender.loan_because: I am trying to ask for help because of my unfortunate situation. I just dropped 3 classes from college and am only taking one class so I am able to work. I have 1 child and 1 dog who live with me in my grandmothers house. I babysit and make very little money. And i mean very very little. My dog is sick and I am afraid to bring it to the vet because they will take him away. Our dog Is the only thing my 5 year old son has in life. I am trying to loan $1000 dollars so that I can get through for the next 2 months. That is it. I need to feed my baby and hopefully when I find a better job, get back into school. If you can help than it is greatly appreciated! My personal blog will be up soon so you can get to know a little more about me. Thank you all so much for helping in these tough times.
lender.occupational_info: I babysit and watch children at my home.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by the success of cooperatives and other small businesses I visited in Southern Mexico many of which benefited from microloans.
lender.occupational_info: I lead teams of business area leaders on process improvement projects with the goal of eliminating waste and increasing efficiency.

lender.name: Olga
lender.loan_because: just to help

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in other's lives.

lender.name: Matthew & Hannah
lender.loan_because: we want to and we can.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: SYSK got me hooked, and $25 is a an amount that anyone can afford.
lender.occupational_info: I do a little database work and a little software testing.

lender.name: detra
lender.loan_because: We are all trying to make a difference and I realize that I have more than most. So, I would like others to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I provide safety and food service for wealthy on private aircraft.

lender.name: Marc
lender.occupational_info: Sometimes I have hair. Sometimes I don't.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I enjoy reading their stories and seeing the borrowers lives improved.
lender.occupational_info: I provide information that helps people do their jobs better.

lender.name: Ricardo
lender.loan_because: There are some who can survive with what some may consider a surplus. Donate is also a privilege. We live too well...

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: It's the best way to help struggling areas of the world.

lender.name: John and Mary
lender.loan_because: It's all His.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I'm just starting, it looks very beneficial

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I am an active member of RESULTS Canada where we advocate for the expansion of Microcredit and the end of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a financial manager in the public sector for many years and now teach both in Canada and the developing world. I have a particular affinity for the NW province in Cameroon, where i spent a month as a volunteer in 2008.

lender.name: Leilani
lender.loan_because: I've read about micro lending [Grameen Bank] and think it really changes lives helping people make their business ideas happen. I feel like each person can and does make a difference. I feel fortunate in my life and want to help others especially women and creative work.
lender.occupational_info: I am a massage therapist. I treat 3 to 6 people, one at a time, 6 days a week, helping them heal and feel better through my touch.

lender.name: Tia
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand every now and then!

lender.name: dsj
lender.loan_because: Donating as part of the "Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious" team is a great opportunity to help society understand that people really can be good without god. :) I don't believe there is a god, but I have great love and empathy for people. It makes me happy to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer software.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I feel like it is a good hedge to the economy, I don't believe the growth of the next generation will come from the U.S.
lender.occupational_info: I make systems to allow people to automate business processes

lender.name: Christopher and Alicia
lender.loan_because: Growing businesses does more work than giving a meal.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want to share the abundance that I've been given.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and companies make the world a better place through their work.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: to teach my children

lender.name: Kurt, Kara and Kyah
lender.loan_because: It helps

lender.name: Xanthe
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have a home, food and money to educate their children
lender.occupational_info: I process annuities for disabled and retired workers

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I'd like to try to make a difference for people less fortunate than I am and I'm trying to tithe to repay the Universe for the blessings I have, although many may not think these are many because I'm "poor" myself.
lender.occupational_info: I perform many services including helping people recover unclaimed funds from their state governments in the U.S. I offer personal shopping and research services. I have much information about saving money and getting free services and grants for people in financial need. I also am trying to help people heal through the "flower" of positive thinking, namely, lavender, in sachets and tea. I feel I was born to do these two things: heal and serve.

lender.name: Sabrina
lender.loan_because: I know that microfinance works.
lender.occupational_info: I work in community relations and development to ensure that my clients build honest and transparent relationships with their neighbouring communities and contribute to needed sustainable development programmes.

lender.name: wen lei
lender.loan_because: i believe in opportunities.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: Money creates opportunity, hard work creates success. I am happy to to have the chance to create positive changes in the lives of others. Peace!
lender.occupational_info: I work in advertising for technology companies.

lender.name: Leena
lender.occupation: Marketing Director soon to launch my own business!
lender.loan_because: A small payment that we take for granted goes a long way for many people around the world. It's our duty as blessed individuals to give back to our brothers and sisters across the globe. It makes me happy that I can contribute towards making a difference to someone's life and empower them to prosper.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I'd like to learn about how microloans can make a difference to help fight ignorance and poverty, empower people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a certifier for abused and neglected children so they can live in healthy families who can help them become healthy individuals.

lender.name: Judy
lender.occupation: retired Certified Financial Planner and R.N.

lender.name: LL, Inc
lender.loan_because: Because we support change, and hold dear to our hearts those whom strive to help others who need a lending hand.
lender.occupational_info: LL, Inc is a clothing line for mixed martial arts.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in different parts of the world, feel good about their business and achieve a sense of pride from their accomplishments. Also, I hope that lending to people in need will inspire others to help their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student at Northern Illinois University, studying Business Administration.

lender.name: property boom
lender.loan_because: My name is muhammad nadeem ahmed.I have completed MBA/ MA and running my own newspaper on real estate sector from the last two years named "Monthly Property Boom".In Pakistan thousands of people are engaged in property business.Unfortunately most of them are uneducated and not able to run their business,that's why they are suffering a lot of financial problems.Through my business consultancy and newspaper i tried to give them real information about property transactions but that is not enough for them.So i planned to open institute named "Professional Development Institute"(PID) but due lack of funds i am in trouble.I have complete feasibility to open institute for free eduction in pakistan especially for those who are poor. I need $20,000/- to establish an institute. Kindly help me to to develop such institute ,so that i would be able decrease the poverty in Pakistan. My contact no:+92 300 4777901,Email:nadeem.mkt@gmail.com
lender.occupational_info: I have two kids and sporting my family as self employed.I want to fulfill my dream to develop an institute named "Professional Development institute"in Lahore to overcome poverty in Pakistan.That's why i need loan of $20,000/- to manage and develop an institute.As i grow i will open branches all over Pakistan to develop the professional in the field of real estate and IT. My name is muhammad nadeem ahmed.I have completed MBA/ MA and running my own newspaper on real estate sector from the last two years named "Monthly Property Boom".In Pakistan thousands of people are engaged in property business.Unfortunately most of them are uneducated and not able to run their business,that's why they are suffering a lot of financial problems.Through my business consultancy and newspaper i tried to give them real information about property transactions but that is not enough for them.So i planned to open institute named "Professional Development Institute"(PID) but due lack of funds i am in trouble.I have complete feasibility to open institute for free eduction in Pakistan especially for those who are poor. I need $20,000/- to establish an institute. Kindly help me to to develop such institute ,so that i would be able decrease the poverty in Pakistan. My contact no:+92 300 4777901,Email:nadeem.mkt@gmail.com

lender.name: emanuele
lender.loan_because: I have been changing the world one life at the time and I intend to continue!
lender.occupational_info: I teach the Italian language in small university called "the University of the Sunshine Coast". This institution is based in Queensland, in a beautiful and subtropical paradise. In my job I get to contribute to the lives of tens of students every year, by teaching them the Italian language, cultural difference and acceptance.

lender.name: Hayley
lender.loan_because: I am so abundantly blessed and it is my responsibility to share that with others :-)

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: $25+ will help many deserving people who are in desperate need rather than me wasting it on myself because I can....

lender.name: Abdullah
lender.loan_because: to start a small busines
lender.occupational_info: courrier service

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: although this was a gift, the one who gave it and I believe that all we have is given to us. We are stewards of our possessions, including money. One day we will give account for our overseeing of it.
lender.occupational_info: I care for an elderly person with Alzheimer's disease. It is important to give loving care just as I would hope someone would lovingly care for me, if I were the one being cared for.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life by giving them a choice. Hopefully this will empower them to rise up out of poverty, restore dignity, and help them make meaningful contributions to their community.
lender.occupational_info: I pastor a local church and we are interested in connecting with the community to meet real needs.

lender.name: hqmm
lender.loan_because: we have too much and we want to share so others can achieve more

lender.name: Bettina
lender.loan_because: I can, it is easy to do and it helps people work towards their dreams with dignity and at their own pace.
